metadata.name: Potential Binary Proxy Execution Via VSDiagnostics.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "VSDiagnostics.exe" with the "start" command in order to launch and proxy arbitrary binaries.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\vsdiagnostics.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('vsdiagnostics.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('start')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /launch:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -launch:'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of "VSDiagnostics.exe" with the "start" command in order to launch and proxy arbitrary binaries.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage for tracing and diagnostics purposes Reference: https://twitter.com/0xBoku/status/1679200664013135872
